original_sentence: There was an estimated 50% excess risk of malignancy among methotrexate-exposed RA patients relative to the general population (SIR 1.5, 95% confidence interval [95% CI] 1.2-1.9), with a 3-fold increase in melanoma (SIR 3.0, 95% CI 1.2-6.2), a 5-fold increase in non-Hodgkin's lymphoma (SIR 5.1, 95% CI 2.2-10.0), and an almost 3-fold increase in lung cancer (SIR 2.9, 95% CI 1.6-4.8).
